docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Thirty-nine organizations, including the American Medical Association, asked the District of Columbia Court of Appeals today to reconsider a ruling that a gravely ill pregnant woman could be forced to undergo a Caesarean delivery against her wishes.

headline.main: Wide Appeal Filed on Forced Caesarean Delivery

docs.snippet: LEAD: Thirty-nine organizations, including the American Medical Association, asked the District of Columbia Court of Appeals today to reconsider a ruling that a gravely ill pregnant woman could be forced to undergo a Caesarean delivery against her...
